item.title: Why Nextdoor Just Relaunched Its App Under the Original Co-Founder
item.description: Nirav Tolia is back at the company he co-founded and says the app’s redesign will make it more useful and timely.

item.title: The 10 U.S. States With the Highest Layoff Rates
item.description: A new analysis of government data shows the places where layoffs have hit hardest in relation to the size of a state’s total workforce.

item.title: Waymo Just Crossed 100 Million Miles of Driverless Rides. Meanwhile, Tesla Has Started Small
item.description: Waymo is picking up speed as Tesla eyes expanding its own more limited robotaxi services.

item.title: Starbucks Just Made a Big Announcement About Remote Work. 2 Very Important Words Were Missing
item.description: Starbucks CEO Brian Niccol’s words will hold a lot more weight if he can show Starbucks employees he’s willing to do what he’s asking them to do.

item.title: My Employees Don’t Acknowledge the Company’s Appreciation Initiatives
item.description: Is it too much to expect a thank-you?
